api_list.api_description: Predicts the gender of a single name, optionally scoped to a specific country.

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: The name to predict gender for.

optional_parameters.name: country_id
optional_parameters.description: Country code for localization following ISO 3166-1 alpha-2.

api_list.api_description: Get information about a color in various formats and its contrasting text colors.

required_parameters.name: color
required_parameters.description: The color in Keyword, HEX, RGB, RGBA, HSL, or HSLA format.

query: What is the predicted gender of the name 'Alex', and can you also provide information about the complementary and grayscale version of the color 'skyblue'?
